artist_names: Megan Thee Stallion (Ft. 千葉雄喜 (Yuki Chiba))
full_title: Mamushi by Megan Thee Stallion (Ft. 千葉雄喜 (Yuki Chiba))
title: Mamushi

description.plain:
“Mamushi” is a song collaboration between Megan Thee Stallion and the Japanese artist Yuki Chiba, formerly known as KOHH. When Megan visited Japan in March 2024 to present at the Anime Awards, she posted an Instagram photo where the two were seen sitting together. This had fans speculating whether the two would be creating something together.

Mamushi is a type of snake found in Japan. This continues the metaphorical theme of Megan’s album, which is the beginning of something new – she is shedding her skin like snakes do. This is a great collaboration for Megan, as she is a huge fan of Japanese culture. In a way, she is paying homage through her use of Japanese and also by collaborating with a very popular Japanese rapper.

embed_content: Read “Mamushi” by Megan Thee Stallion on Genius

body.plain:
“Mamushi” is a song collaboration between Megan Thee Stallion and the Japanese artist Yuki Chiba, formerly known as KOHH. When Megan visited Japan in March 2024 to present at the Anime Awards, she posted an Instagram photo where the two were seen sitting together. This had fans speculating whether the two would be creating something together.

Mamushi is a type of snake found in Japan. This continues the metaphorical theme of Megan’s album, which is the beginning of something new – she is shedding her skin like snakes do. This is a great collaboration for Megan, as she is a huge fan of Japanese culture. In a way, she is paying homage through her use of Japanese and also by collaborating with a very popular Japanese rapper.
